I collect all kinds of music from folk music, ethnic, movie
soundtracks, all kinds, including gangsta rap, R&B, metal, trance etc
but for a while now I have been looking for tracks which "could be"
Shinsengumi songs.

It isn't necessary for the lyrics to mentions samurai, swords, honor
etc etc etc because I am creating a Shinsengumi alternate universe
anyways where they exist in our era.

For example

if Nagakura + Harada were going clubbing...this would be their track
"Starry Eyed Surprise" artist Oakenfold [Bunkka]
http://www.pauloakenfold.com/
***this song has been used in car commercials I believe

what do I do with this music?  I just shove them on my cheapo mp3
player and listen to them while I wander aimlessly in my school's
library---or when I have to do alot of typing (beats listening to
either left or right wing political talk radio)

so Please email me off-list by clicking the "email" button at the top
or secretarytocapt3(a)hotmail.com
[OR] if you have this really great list you'd like to share you can
just post here on the mailing list

you can give the song name, CD and just one or two words why you think
it may fit a shinsengumi theme---I work near a used CD store so it
shouldn't be too hard for me to find the song you mention

note: I already some more obvious OST like "Last SAmurai (Hans zimmer)
or Mibugishiden (Joe Hisaishi)---a sample track is available at
http://www.hajimenokizu.com

thank you
